latestMedicalNews.title: Latest Medical News
latestMedicalNews.description: Stay informed with the latest updates from the medical world. Explore trusted news, research highlights, and healthcare insights tailored to keep you and your family up to date.

searchBySpecialty.title: Search by Specialty
searchBySpecialty.description: Search for a specific specialty to find a doctor who specializes in that area.

largestBlogs.title: Our Latest Blog Posts
largestBlogs.description: Here you can find patient stories, doctors blogs, and blog posts.

notFound.title: Page Not Found
notFound.description: The page you're looking for seems to have wandered off like a lost patient. Don't worry, our medical team is here to help you find your way back to health and the right page.

footer.mission: At Weqayah, we're more than just a healthcare platform; we're a healthcare community dedicated to improving the way patients and doctors connect. Our mission is to simplify the healthcare journey and empower patients to make informed decisions about their health.
footer.copyright: Copyright Â© 2025 Weqayah. All rights reserved.

searchResults.noDoctorsFoundMatchingYourCriteria: No doctors found matching your criteria.

aboutUs.title: About Us
aboutUs.description: At Weqayah, we are proud to be the beacon to the future of medical software and to disrupt the industry.
aboutUs.whoWeAreDescription: A digital haven for patients and doctors, to connect and show their stories.
aboutUs.whoWeServeDescription: We serve both doctors and patients and bridge the gap between them and publish their stories.
aboutUs.ourMissionDescription: To be trusted by both the medical community and the patients community worldwide.
aboutUs.ourStoryDescription: Weqayah was created as a bridge and platform to showcase the doctors and patients stories and fill the gap.
